# API Reference: supersonic.data.*

The `supersonic.data` namespace includes APIs that work with AppGyver's cloud data services. They provide efficient ways for manipulating data â€“ creating, updating and deleting records. Read more in the [Data Guides](/supersonic/guides/data/).
